title: Comments on Monetary Policy
content: - 7 -   clues about the future stance of monetary policy should take care not to over-interpret   these movements.  We have attempted in recent weeks to provide more clarity about the   nature of our policy reaction function, but I view the fundamentals of our underlying   policy stance as broadly unchanged.   Thank you.  I look forward to your questions .
